metadata.description: Diagnostic Trouble Code database for automotive diagnostics

P0002.description: Fuel Volume Regulator Control Circuit Range/Performance

possible_causes: Engine oil level low or dirty
VVT actuator stuck in advanced position

P0102.description: Mass Air Flow (MAF) Circuit Low Input
possible_causes: MAF sensor circuit shorted to ground

P0103.description: Mass Air Flow (MAF) Circuit High Input
possible_causes: MAF sensor circuit shorted to voltage

P0107.description: Manifold Absolute Pressure (MAP) Circuit Low Input
possible_causes: MAP sensor circuit shorted to ground

P0108.description: Manifold Absolute Pressure (MAP) Circuit High Input
possible_causes: MAP sensor circuit shorted to voltage
IAT sensor circuit open or short

P0117.description: Engine Coolant Temperature Circuit Low Input
possible_causes: Coolant sensor circuit shorted to ground

P0118.description: Engine Coolant Temperature Circuit High Input
possible_causes: Coolant sensor circuit open or shorted to voltage

P0122.description: Throttle Position Sensor Circuit Low Input

P0123.description: Throttle Position Sensor Circuit High Input

P0125.description: Insufficient Coolant Temperature for Closed Loop Fuel Control

P0128.description: Coolant Thermostat (Coolant Temperature Below Thermostat Regulating Temperature)

P0131.description: O2 Sensor Circuit Low Voltage (Bank 1 Sensor 1)
possible_causes: Oxygen sensor circuit shorted to ground

P0132.description: O2 Sensor Circuit High Voltage (Bank 1 Sensor 1)
possible_causes: Oxygen sensor circuit shorted to voltage

P0133.description: O2 Sensor Circuit Slow Response (Bank 1 Sensor 1)

P0134.description: O2 Sensor Circuit No Activity Detected (Bank 1 Sensor 1)

P0135.description: O2 Sensor Heater Circuit Malfunction (Bank 1 Sensor 1)

P0137.description: O2 Sensor Circuit Low Voltage (Bank 1 Sensor 2)
possible_causes: Oxygen sensor circuit shorted to ground

P0138.description: O2 Sensor Circuit High Voltage (Bank 1 Sensor 2)
possible_causes: Oxygen sensor circuit shorted to voltage

P0140.description: O2 Sensor Circuit No Activity Detected (Bank 1 Sensor 2)

P0141.description: O2 Sensor Heater Circuit Malfunction (Bank 1 Sensor 2)

P0151.description: O2 Sensor Circuit Low Voltage (Bank 2 Sensor 1)
possible_causes: Oxygen sensor circuit shorted to ground

P0152.description: O2 Sensor Circuit High Voltage (Bank 2 Sensor 1)
possible_causes: Oxygen sensor circuit shorted to voltage

P0320.description: Ignition/Distributor Engine Speed Input Circuit Malfunction

P0403.description: Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) Control Circuit Malfunction

P0421.description: Warm Up Catalyst Efficiency Below Threshold (Bank 1)
possible_causes: Engine running too rich or lean

P0441.description: Evaporative Emission Control System Incorrect Purge Flow
possible_causes: Purge valve stuck open or closed

P0442.description: Evaporative Emission Control System Leak Detected (Small Leak)

P0443.description: Evaporative Emission Control System Purge Control Valve Circuit Malfunction

P0446.description: Evaporative Emission Control System Vent Control Circuit Malfunction

P0455.description: Evaporative Emission Control System Leak Detected (Large Leak)

P0456.description: Evaporative Emission Control System Leak Detected (Very Small Leak)

possible_causes: IAC valve stuck or carbon buildup

P0506.description: Idle Control System RPM Lower Than Expected

P0507.description: Idle Control System RPM Higher Than Expected

P0601.description: Internal Control Module Memory Check Sum Error

P0603.description: Internal Control Module Keep Alive Memory (KAM) Error

P0604.description: Internal Control Module Random Access Memory (RAM) Error

P0605.description: Internal Control Module Read Only Memory (ROM) Error

possible_causes: Alternator field circuit shorted to ground

P0630.description: VIN Not Programmed or Mismatch - ECM/PCM

P0705.description: Transmission Range Sensor Circuit Malfunction (PRNDL Input)

P0710.description: Transmission Fluid Temperature Sensor Circuit Malfunction

C0035.description: Left Front Wheel Speed Circuit Malfunction

C0040.description: Right Front Wheel Speed Circuit Malfunction

C0045.description: Left Rear Wheel Speed Circuit Malfunction

C0050.description: Right Rear Wheel Speed Circuit Malfunction

C0221.description: Right Front Wheel Speed Sensor Input Signal Missing

C0222.description: Right Front Wheel Speed Signal Erratic

C0225.description: Left Front Wheel Speed Sensor Input Signal Missing

C0226.description: Left Front Wheel Speed Signal Erratic

C0229.description: Right Rear Wheel Speed Sensor Input Signal Missing

C0230.description: Right Rear Wheel Speed Signal Erratic

C0233.description: Left Rear Wheel Speed Sensor Input Signal Missing

C0234.description: Left Rear Wheel Speed Signal Erratic

C0265.description: Electronic Brake Control Module Relay Circuit

C0268.description: Pump Motor Circuit Shorted to Ground
possible_causes: Pump motor circuit shorted to ground

C0269.description: Pump Motor Circuit Shorted to Voltage
possible_causes: Pump motor circuit shorted to battery

C0281.description: Brake Booster Pressure Sensor Circuit Malfunction

C0321.description: Front Left Height Sensor Circuit Malfunction

C0325.description: Front Right Height Sensor Circuit Malfunction

C0327.description: Rear Left Height Sensor Circuit Malfunction

C0330.description: Rear Right Height Sensor Circuit Malfunction

C0750.description: Electronic Stability Program (ESP) Control Module Performance

B0015.description: Driver Seat Belt Pretensioner Circuit Malfunction

B0016.description: Passenger Seat Belt Pretensioner Circuit Malfunction

B0050.description: Driver Seat Belt Buckle Switch Circuit Malfunction

B0051.description: Passenger Seat Belt Buckle Switch Circuit Malfunction

B0132.description: Passenger Airbag Deactivation Indicator Circuit Malfunction

possible_causes: Left front TPMS sensor battery dead
Right front TPMS sensor battery dead
Left rear TPMS sensor battery dead
Right rear TPMS sensor battery dead
Spare tire TPMS sensor battery dead

U0102.description: Lost Communication With Transfer Case Control Module

U0103.description: Lost Communication With Gear Shift Module

U0121.description: Lost Communication With ABS Control Module

U0122.description: Lost Communication With Vehicle Dynamics Control Module

U0123.description: Lost Communication With Yaw Rate Sensor Module

U0140.description: Lost Communication With Body Control Module

U0141.description: Lost Communication With Body Control Module 'B'

U0151.description: Lost Communication With SRS Control Module

U0155.description: Lost Communication With Instrument Panel Cluster

U0164.description: Lost Communication With HVAC Control Module

U0168.description: Lost Communication With Vehicle Security Control Module

possible_causes: CAN High or Low wire open circuit
CAN High or Low shorted to ground
CAN High or Low shorted to voltage
CAN High and Low shorted together
